description: Gets metadata on a specified stream.

nested_items.name: streamSession
nested_items.description: List of stream details.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: Channel ARN.

nested_items.name: authorized
nested_items.description: Whether the channel is private (enabled for playback authorization). Default: false.

nested_items.name: containerFormat
nested_items.description: Indicates which content-packaging format is used (MPEG-TS or fMP4). If multitrackInputConfiguration is specified and enabled is true, then containerFormat is required and must be set to FRAGMENTED_MP4. Otherwise, containerFormat may be set to TS or FRAGMENTED_MP4. Default: TS.

nested_items.name: ingestEndpoint
nested_items.description: Channel ingest endpoint, part of the definition of an ingest server, used when you set up streaming software.

nested_items.name: insecureIngest
nested_items.description: Whether the channel allows insecure RTMP ingest. Default: false.

nested_items.name: latencyMode
nested_items.description: Channel latency mode. Use NORMAL to broadcast and deliver live video up to Full HD. Use LOW for near-real-time interaction with viewers. Default: LOW.

nested_items.name: multitrackInputConfiguration
nested_items.description: Object specifying multitrack input configuration. Default: no multitrack input configuration is specified.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether multitrack input is enabled. Can be set to true only if channel type is STANDARD. Setting enabled to true with any other channel type will cause an exception. If true, then policy, maximumResolution, and containerFormat are required, and containerFormat must be set to FRAGMENTED_MP4. Default: false.

nested_items.name: maximumResolution
nested_items.description: Maximum resolution for multitrack input. Required if enabled is true.

nested_items.name: policy
nested_items.description: Indicates whether multitrack input is allowed or required. Required if enabled is true.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Channel name.

nested_items.name: playbackRestrictionPolicyArn
nested_items.description: Playback-restriction-policy ARN. A valid ARN value here both specifies the ARN and enables playback restriction. Default: '' (empty string, no playback restriction policy is applied).

nested_items.name: playbackUrl
nested_items.description: Channel playback URL.

nested_items.name: preset
nested_items.description: Optional transcode preset for the channel. This is selectable only for ADVANCED_HD and ADVANCED_SD channel types. For those channel types, the default preset is HIGHER_BANDWIDTH_DELIVERY. For other channel types ( BASIC and STANDARD), preset is the empty string ( "").

nested_items.name: recordingConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: Recording-configuration ARN. A valid ARN value here both specifies the ARN and enables recording. Default: '' (empty string, recording is disabled).

nested_items.name: endpoint
nested_items.description: The endpoint to be used when streaming with IVS using the SRT protocol.

nested_items.name: passphrase
nested_items.description: Auto-generated passphrase to enable encryption. This field is applicable only if the end user has not enabled the insecureIngest option for the channel.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Channel type, which determines the allowable resolution and bitrate. If you exceed the allowable input resolution or bitrate, the stream probably will disconnect immediately. Default: STANDARD. For details, see Channel Types.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: Time when the channel went offline. This is an ISO 8601 timestamp; note that this is returned as a string. For live streams, this is NULL.

nested_items.name: ingestConfiguration
nested_items.description: The properties of the incoming RTMP stream.

nested_items.name: channels
nested_items.description: Number of audio channels.

nested_items.name: codec
nested_items.description: Codec used for the audio encoding.

nested_items.name: sampleRate
nested_items.description: Number of audio samples recorded per second.

nested_items.name: targetBitrate
nested_items.description: The expected ingest bitrate (bits per second). This is configured in the encoder.

nested_items.name: track
nested_items.description: Name of the audio track (if the stream has an audio track). If multitrack is not enabled, this is track0 (the sole track).

nested_items.name: avcLevel
nested_items.description: Indicates the degree of required decoder performance for a profile. Normally this is set automatically by the encoder. For details, see the H.264 specification.

nested_items.name: avcProfile
nested_items.description: Indicates to the decoder the requirements for decoding the stream. For definitions of the valid values, see the H.264 specification.

nested_items.name: codec
nested_items.description: Codec used for the video encoding.

nested_items.name: encoder
nested_items.description: Software or hardware used to encode the video.

nested_items.name: level
nested_items.description: Indicates the degree of required decoder performance for a profile. Normally this is set automatically by the encoder. When an AVC codec is used, this field has the same value as avcLevel.

nested_items.name: profile
nested_items.description: Indicates to the decoder the requirements for decoding the stream. When an AVC codec is used, this field has the same value as avcProfile.

nested_items.name: targetBitrate
nested_items.description: The expected ingest bitrate (bits per second). This is configured in the encoder.

nested_items.name: targetFramerate
nested_items.description: The expected ingest framerate. This is configured in the encoder.

nested_items.name: track
nested_items.description: Name of the video track. If multitrack is not enabled, this is track0 (the sole track).

nested_items.name: videoHeight
nested_items.description: Video-resolution height in pixels.

nested_items.name: videoWidth
nested_items.description: Video-resolution width in pixels.

nested_items.name: ingestConfigurations
nested_items.description: The properties of the incoming RTMP stream. If multitrack is enabled, ingestConfigurations contains data for all tracks; otherwise, it contains data only for track0 (the sole track).

nested_items.name: audioConfigurations
nested_items.description: Encoder settings for audio.

nested_items.name: channels
nested_items.description: Number of audio channels.

nested_items.name: codec
nested_items.description: Codec used for the audio encoding.

nested_items.name: sampleRate
nested_items.description: Number of audio samples recorded per second.

nested_items.name: targetBitrate
nested_items.description: The expected ingest bitrate (bits per second). This is configured in the encoder.

nested_items.name: track
nested_items.description: Name of the audio track (if the stream has an audio track). If multitrack is not enabled, this is track0 (the sole track).

nested_items.name: videoConfigurations
nested_items.description: Encoder settings for video.

nested_items.name: avcLevel
nested_items.description: Indicates the degree of required decoder performance for a profile. Normally this is set automatically by the encoder. For details, see the H.264 specification.

nested_items.name: avcProfile
nested_items.description: Indicates to the decoder the requirements for decoding the stream. For definitions of the valid values, see the H.264 specification.

nested_items.name: codec
nested_items.description: Codec used for the video encoding.

nested_items.name: encoder
nested_items.description: Software or hardware used to encode the video.

nested_items.name: level
nested_items.description: Indicates the degree of required decoder performance for a profile. Normally this is set automatically by the encoder. When an AVC codec is used, this field has the same value as avcLevel.

nested_items.name: profile
nested_items.description: Indicates to the decoder the requirements for decoding the stream. When an AVC codec is used, this field has the same value as avcProfile.

nested_items.name: targetBitrate
nested_items.description: The expected ingest bitrate (bits per second). This is configured in the encoder.

nested_items.name: targetFramerate
nested_items.description: The expected ingest framerate. This is configured in the encoder.

nested_items.name: track
nested_items.description: Name of the video track. If multitrack is not enabled, this is track0 (the sole track).

nested_items.name: videoHeight
nested_items.description: Video-resolution height in pixels.

nested_items.name: videoWidth
nested_items.description: Video-resolution width in pixels.

nested_items.name: recordingConfiguration
nested_items.description: The properties of recording the live stream.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: Recording-configuration ARN.

nested_items.name: destinationConfiguration
nested_items.description: A complex type that contains information about where recorded video will be stored.

nested_items.name: bucketName
nested_items.description: where recorded videos will be stored.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Recording-configuration name. The value does not need to be unique.

nested_items.name: recordingReconnectWindowSeconds
nested_items.description: If a broadcast disconnects and then reconnects within the specified interval, the multiple streams will be considered a single broadcast and merged together. Default: 0.

nested_items.name: renditionConfiguration
nested_items.description: Object that describes which renditions should be recorded for a stream.

nested_items.name: renditionSelection
nested_items.description: Indicates which set of renditions are recorded for a stream. For BASIC channels, the CUSTOM value has no effect. If CUSTOM is specified, a set of renditions must be specified in the renditions field. Default: ALL.

nested_items.name: renditions
nested_items.description: Indicates which renditions are recorded for a stream, if renditionSelection is CUSTOM; otherwise, this field is irrelevant. The selected renditions are recorded if they are available during the stream. If a selected rendition is unavailable, the best available rendition is recorded. For details on the resolution dimensions of each rendition, see Auto-Record to Amazon S3.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: Indicates the current state of the recording configuration. When the state is ACTIVE, the configuration is ready for recording a channel stream.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: thumbnailConfiguration
nested_items.description: A complex type that allows you to enable/disable the recording of thumbnails for a live session and modify the interval at which thumbnails are generated for the live session.

nested_items.name: recordingMode
nested_items.description: Thumbnail recording mode. Default: INTERVAL.

nested_items.name: resolution
nested_items.description: Indicates the desired resolution of recorded thumbnails. Thumbnails are recorded at the selected resolution if the corresponding rendition is available during the stream; otherwise, they are recorded at source resolution. For more information about resolution values and their corresponding height and width dimensions, see Auto-Record to Amazon S3. Default: Null (source resolution is returned).

nested_items.name: storage
nested_items.description: Indicates the format in which thumbnails are recorded. SEQUENTIAL records all generated thumbnails in a serial manner, to the media/thumbnails directory. LATEST saves the latest thumbnail in media/latest_thumbnail/thumb.jpg and overwrites it at the interval specified by targetIntervalSeconds. You can enable both SEQUENTIAL and LATEST. Default: SEQUENTIAL.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: targetIntervalSeconds
nested_items.description: The targeted thumbnail-generation interval in seconds. This is configurable (and required) only if recordingMode is INTERVAL. Default: 60.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: Time when the channel went live. This is an ISO 8601 timestamp; note that this is returned as a string.

nested_items.name: streamId
nested_items.description: Unique identifier for a live or previously live stream in the specified channel.

nested_items.name: truncatedEvents
nested_items.description: List of Amazon IVS events that the stream encountered. The list is sorted by most recent events and contains up to 500 events. For Amazon IVS events, see Using Amazon EventBridge with Amazon IVS.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: Provides additional details about the stream event. There are several values; the long descriptions are provided in the IVS console but not delivered through the IVS API or EventBridge. Multitrack-related codes are used only for certain Session Ended events.

MultitrackInputNotAllowed -- The broadcast client attempted to connect with multitrack input, but multitrack input was not enabled on the channel. Check your broadcast software settings or set MultitrackInputConfiguration.Policy to ALLOW or REQUIRE.

MultitrackInputRequired -- The broadcast client attempted to connect with single-track video, but multitrack input is required on this channel. Enable multitrack video in your broadcast software or configure the channel's MultitrackInputConfiguration.Policy to ALLOW.
InvalidGetClientConfigurationStreamKey -- The broadcast client attempted to connect with an invalid, expired, or corrupt stream key.
GetClientConfigurationStreamKeyRequired -- The broadcast client attempted to stream multitrack video without providing an authenticated stream key from GetClientConfiguration.
InvalidMultitrackInputTrackCount -- The multitrack input stream contained an invalid number of tracks.
InvalidMultitrackInputVideoTrackMediaProperties -- The multitrack input stream contained one or more tracks with an invalid codec, resolution, bitrate, or framerate.

nested_items.type: e.g., codec, resolution, or video track type
nested_items.description: StreamTakeoverMediaMismatch -- The broadcast client attempted to take over with different media properties (e.g., codec, resolution, or video track type) from the original stream.

StreamTakeoverInvalidPriority -- The broadcast client attempted a takeover with either a priority integer value equal to or lower than the original stream's value or a value outside the allowed range of 1 to 2,147,483,647. StreamTakeoverLimitBreached -- The broadcast client reached the maximum allowed takeover attempts for this stream.

nested_items.name: eventTime
nested_items.description: Time when the event occurred. This is an ISO 8601 timestamp; note that this is returned as a string.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Name that identifies the stream event within a type.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Logical group for certain events.
